ExecuteSQL.Name: SQL Drop and Create Production_Product
ExecuteSQL.DirectInput:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[stage].[Product]') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE [stage].[Product] GO
CREATE TABLE [stage].[Product] ( -- Columns Definition [ProductID] int NOT NULL , [Name] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL , [ProductNumber] nvarchar(25) NOT NULL , [MakeFlag] bit NOT NULL , [FinishedGoodsFlag] bit NOT NULL , [Color] nvarchar(15) , [SafetyStockLevel] smallint NOT NULL , [ReorderPoint] smallint NOT NULL , [StandardCost] money NOT NULL , [ListPrice] money NOT NULL , [Size] nvarchar(5) , [SizeUnitMeasureCode] nchar(3) , [WeightUnitMeasureCode] nchar(3) , [Weight] decimal(8,2) , [DaysToManufacture] int NOT NULL , [ProductLine] nchar(2) , [Class] nchar(2) , [Style] nchar(2) , [ProductSubcategoryID] int , [ProductModelID] int , [SellStartDate] datetime NOT NULL , [SellEndDate] datetime , [DiscontinuedDate] datetime , [rowguid] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL , [ModifiedDate] datetime NOT NULL
-- Constraints
) ON "default" WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = NONE) GO
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ExecuteSQL.Name: SQL Drop and Create Production_ProductCategory
ExecuteSQL.DirectInput:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[stage].[ProductCategory]') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE [stage].[ProductCategory] GO
CREATE TABLE [stage].[ProductCategory] ( -- Columns Definition [ProductCategoryID] int NOT NULL , [Name] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL , [rowguid] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL , [ModifiedDate] datetime NOT NULL
-- Constraints
) ON "default" WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = NONE) GO
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ExecuteSQL.Name: SQL Drop and Create Production_ProductSubcategory
ExecuteSQL.DirectInput:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[stage].[ProductSubcategory]') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE [stage].[ProductSubcategory] GO
CREATE TABLE [stage].[ProductSubcategory] ( -- Columns Definition [ProductSubcategoryID] int NOT NULL , [ProductCategoryID] int NOT NULL , [Name] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL , [rowguid] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL , [ModifiedDate] datetime NOT NULL
-- Constraints
) ON "default" WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = NONE) GO
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ExecuteSQL.Name: SQL Drop and Create Sales_SalesOrderDetail
ExecuteSQL.DirectInput:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[stage].[SalesOrderDetail]') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE [stage].[SalesOrderDetail] GO
CREATE TABLE [stage].[SalesOrderDetail] ( -- Columns Definition [SalesOrderID] int NOT NULL , [SalesOrderDetailID] int NOT NULL , [CarrierTrackingNumber] nvarchar(25) , [OrderQty] smallint NOT NULL , [ProductID] int NOT NULL , [SpecialOfferID] int NOT NULL , [UnitPrice] money NOT NULL , [UnitPriceDiscount] money NOT NULL , [LineTotal] decimal(38,6) NOT NULL , [rowguid] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL , [ModifiedDate] datetime NOT NULL
-- Constraints
) ON "default" WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = NONE) GO
-------------------------------------------------------------------

ExecuteSQL.Name: SQL Drop and Create Sales_SalesOrderHeader
ExecuteSQL.DirectInput:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
------------------------------------------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * from sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[stage].[SalesOrderHeader]') AND type IN (N'U')) DROP TABLE [stage].[SalesOrderHeader] GO
CREATE TABLE [stage].[SalesOrderHeader] ( -- Columns Definition [SalesOrderID] int NOT NULL , [RevisionNumber] tinyint NOT NULL , [OrderDate] datetime NOT NULL , [DueDate] datetime NOT NULL , [ShipDate] datetime , [Status] tinyint NOT NULL , [OnlineOrderFlag] bit NOT NULL , [SalesOrderNumber] nvarchar(25) NOT NULL , [PurchaseOrderNumber] nvarchar(25) , [AccountNumber] nvarchar(15) , [CustomerID] int NOT NULL , [SalesPersonID] int , [TerritoryID] int , [BillToAddressID] int NOT NULL , [ShipToAddressID] int NOT NULL , [ShipMethodID] int NOT NULL , [CreditCardID] int , [CreditCardApprovalCode] varchar(15) , [CurrencyRateID] int , [SubTotal] money NOT NULL , [TaxAmt] money NOT NULL , [Freight] money NOT NULL , [TotalDue] money NOT NULL , [Comment] nvarchar(128) , [rowguid] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL , [ModifiedDate] datetime NOT NULL
-- Constraints
) ON "default" WITH (DATA_COMPRESSION = NONE) GO
-------------------------------------------------------------------

OutputPath.Name: SCD2
OutputPath.Expression: REPLACENULL(ProductSubcategoryKey,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductSubcategoryKey,0) || REPLACENULL(Name,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Name,0) || REPLACENULL(MakeFlag,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_MakeFlag,0) || REPLACENULL(FinishedGoodsFlag,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_FinishedGoodsFlag,0) || REPLACENULL(Color,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Color,0) || REPLACENULL(ReorderPoint,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ReorderPoint,0) || REPLACENULL(StandardCost,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_StandardCost,0) || REPLACENULL(ListPrice,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ListPrice,0) || REPLACENULL(DaysToManufacture,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_DaysToManufacture,0) || REPLACENULL(ProductSubcategoryID,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductSubcategoryID,0) || REPLACENULL(SellStartDate,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_SellStartDate,0) || REPLACENULL(SellEndDate,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_SellEndDate,0) || REPLACENULL(DiscontinuedDate,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_DiscontinuedDate,0)

OutputPath.Name: SCD1
OutputPath.Expression: REPLACENULL(ProductNumber,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductNumber,0) || REPLACENULL(SafetyStockLevel,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_SafetyStockLevel,0) || REPLACENULL(Size,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Size,0) || REPLACENULL(SizeUnitMeasureCode,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_SizeUnitMeasureCode,0) || REPLACENULL(WeightUnitMeasureCode,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_WeightUnitMeasureCode,0) || REPLACENULL(Weight,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Weight,0) || REPLACENULL(ProductLine,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductLine,0) || REPLACENULL(Class,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Class,0) || REPLACENULL(Style,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Style,0) || REPLACENULL(ProductModelID,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductModelID,0)

OutputPath.Name: SCD1
OutputPath.Expression: REPLACENULL(ProductCategoryKey,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductCategoryKey,0) || REPLACENULL(ProductCategoryID,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_ProductCategoryID,0) || REPLACENULL(Name,0) != REPLACENULL(dim_Name,0)
